Name: Rock Wrecker
About the game: You are the drone controller of a space mining operation. This time you managed to beat the bigger mining company to this section of the asteroid belt. Pilot your drone to get the resources you can before the asteroid you are mining is overrun. Manage your resources to make sure you get the most out of the asteroid belt section you are assigned. Every action will take fuel and drones and the drones are not reusable. Keep an eye out for special crystals. If you manage to get out with them, you can upgrade your mining operation. Pick an asteroid you want to launch your drone to. Get the resources you can before the timer runs out. Move your drone back to the point you entered the asteroid. Now get out there and mine those rocks!
